rules_text:
Create two 1/1 red Beast creature tokens. If you control no tapped lands, instead create three 1/1 red Beast creature tokens and they gain haste.
Suspend 1–{2}{R}{R} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{R}{R} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
